short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help you easily save, manage, share ads, enrich your advertising material library

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
(Note: We are an independent third-party company and are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Meta Platforms, Inc., Facebook, or any of its subsidiaries or affiliates.)

âš™ï¸ Efficient saving: With just one click, you can easily save your favorite ad and say goodbye to the tedious process of downloading and transferring ad.
âš™ï¸ Watermark-free experience: The saved ad videos are clear without watermarks, ensuring the authenticity of ad materials.
âš™ï¸ Intelligent classification: Utilize functions such as ad tags and ad folders to easily classify and manage ad materials, keeping your ad library organized.
âš™ï¸ Team collaboration: Share the ad library with team members to facilitate discussing ad content and filtering ad creatives, and improve team collaboration efficiency.
âš™ï¸ Detailed metadata: When saving ad, you can also automatically capture the detailed metadata of the ad to help you understand the ad information more comprehensively.

ğŸ’¡How to use the ad library:
1ï¸âƒ£ Install and enable: Add the ad library to your Chrome browser and enable it, ready to capture great ad content at any time.
2ï¸âƒ£ Browse TikTok ad: Use the ad library to easily browse various ad on Facebook and discover ad creative inspiration.
3ï¸âƒ£ Download the required materials: When encountering the desired ad video, simply click lightly and the ad library will save it to the system for you.
4ï¸âƒ£ Convenient management and sharing: In the ad library material library, you can freely organize video materials and share them with team members to jointly improve the level of ad creativity.

Whether you are an ad agency, an e-commerce team, or a creative worker, ad Library is an indispensable assistant for you. Come and try it, make ad management simpler and more efficient! For more information, please visit our official website https://www.adslibrary.ai/.
